title: Educational Program for Web-Based Concept Learning Using Flowmaps and Online Testing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and understanding of elementary-level language concepts
context.additional_context: A course designed for busy working professionals to efficiently utilize web-based learning environments, emphasizing personalized activities tailored to individual learning preferences

learning_goals: Learners can represent the interconnected relationships of linguistic concepts as flowmaps with 80% or greater accuracy using inquiry-based content provided on a web-based platform
Learners can evaluate their linguistic concept application ability through weekly online tests and perform two or more concept structure revisions incorporating feedback
Learners can share flowmaps co-created through peer interaction and explain logical associations between concepts from three or more perspectives

resources: Access to Web-Based Concept Learning Platform
Digital Flowchart Creation Tool (MIRO, Google Jamboard, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
